Package cmput301t4.gameswap.Activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddItemActivity
    Class to add an item to user's inventory
    CancelCreateTradeActivity
    Lets user cancel the trade that they made
    CreateProfileActivity
    This activity opens when user clicks on register from the main login page
    DecideTradeActivity
    * This activity allows the user to decide what they want to do with a offered trade.
    EditItemActivity
    Lets you edit an item in user inventory
    EditProfileActivity
    Lets you edit personal information about yourself
    FriendInventoryActivity
    Lets you browse through friend inventory
    FriendProfileActivity
    Views friend's profile and their information
    MainActivity
    This activity opens when the app launches, it asks for username in order to login or let new user create an account
    MineInventoryActivity
    Allows user to select items from their inventory in order to trade
    myInventoryActivity
    Shows all the items in user's inventory
    MyProfileActivity
    Views user's information on one page
    OfferTradeActivity
    Offer trade to other users who are friends
    SearchFriendActivity
    Searches for the friend in the friendlist
    SelectFromFriendInventoryActivity
    Class that let user pick items from friend inventory that they want in trade
    selectTaskActivity
    This class provides an open of viewing their inventory, browse trades and view trade offers
    TradesActivity
    Class that displays user's current and past trades
    ViewItemActivity
    View an item in detail
